Berserker Rage.name: Berserker Rage
Berserker Rage.blurb: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.
Berserker Rage.description: Innate: Olaf gains 0% − 100% (based on missing health)  bonus attack speed.

Undertow.name: Undertow
Undertow.blurb: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's  cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
Undertow.description: Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location, dealing  physical damage to all enemies it passes through and  slowing them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
Undertow.description2: The axe remains at the target location for a duration equal to the  cooldown. Olaf reduces the cooldown of Undertow by 4.5 seconds upon retrieving an axe.
Undertow.notes:
* Undertow briefly grants  sight upon landing.
 The timer for how long an axe stays on the ground starts upon landing, so it is possible to throw another axe before grabbing the one from the ground.
 Olaf cannot pick up an enemy twin's Undertow (unlike  Draven with  Spinning Axe).

Vicious Strikes.name: Vicious Strikes
Vicious Strikes.blurb: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
Vicious Strikes.description: Active: For 6 seconds, Olaf gains  bonus attack speed, bonus  life steal, and 0% − 50% (based on missing health) enhanced  healing from all sources.
Vicious Strikes.description2: Life steal and  spell vamp bonuses are calculated on-cast and remain static for the full duration. If the ability is re-casted the duration refreshes without re-calculating the bonuses.
Vicious Strikes.notes: * Vicious Strikes has no cast time and it does not interrupt Olaf's previous orders.

Reckless Swing.name: Reckless Swing
Reckless Swing.blurb: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
Reckless Swing.description: Active: Olaf deals  true damage to the target enemy.
Reckless Swing.description2: Reckless Swing  heals Olaf for  its health cost if it kills its target and its  cooldown is reduced by 1 second every time Olaf lands a basic attack.
Reckless Swing.notes:
* Olaf will pay Reckless Swing's cost (30% total damage) even if the target is not damaged.
 Reckless Swing can be cast at any health amount but Olaf will never drop below 1 current health (effectively being able to cast for free at that value).
 Reckless Swing's health refund is considered  healing therefore it is affected by  Vicious Strikes and  Spirit Visage.
 Reckless Swing will cancel if Olaf loses sight of his target during cast time.

Ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.blurb: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
Ragnarok.description: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance while Ragnarok is inactive.
Ragnarok.description2: Active: Olaf  cleanses himself of all  crowd control. For the next 6 seconds, he becomes immune to crowd controls and gains bonus attack damage. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed when moving towards nearby visible enemy champions.
Ragnarok.leveling2:
Bonus AD:
15 / 20 / 25 (+ 30% AD)

Bonus Movement Speed:
20 / 45 / 70%
Ragnarok.notes:
* Ragnarok can be cast while Olaf is disabled by enemies but will not remove any active  displacement or  Tempered Fate's  stasis (only future applications).
 Ragnarok will not bypass any allied disables ( Zhonya's Hourglass'  stasis,  Fate's Call).
 Abilities with debuff components ( Permafrost,  Chomp,  Mocking Shout) will not be negated by Ragnarok (only their crowd control ones).
 Against  The Hextech Ultimatum, Olaf can't break free from the area unless he has a blink or a dash during the active duration, this because the border of the Camille's ultimate is considered to be terrain for the affected champ.
 Ragnarok upon activation will not  cleanse  Nearsight.
